General.Name: Topdanmark A/S
General.Description: Topdanmark A/S, together with its subsidiaries, offers life and non-life insurance products and services in Denmark. The company operates through Private and SME segments. It offers illness and accident, health, workers' compensation, motor, fire and property, liability, tourist assistance, and other insurance products, as well as life insurance and pension fund schemes to individual households, agricultural and SME businesses, and private customers under the Topdanmark brands. The company also provides IT, investments, and property services. Topdanmark A/S was founded in 1728 and is headquartered in Ballerup, Denmark.
